string.name: name
string.value: Correcting the Past 2: Good Bye Miner
Future Doctor Bing is looking for someone to prevent the collection of Fossil Minerals required to build a Time Machine.
Go to the Mine in the past using the #b#p9250138##k and defeat the #b#o9420070#s#k that are collecting Fossil Minerals.
You prevented the collection of Fossil Minerals, which are required to build a Time Machine.
Do you remember what happened in the Mine? You collected Fossil Minerals.
I will send you to the Mine of the past using a black whole activation device. You will be fighting against miners like yourself from the past.
Defeat as many miners as you can so that the Fossil Minerals won't be gathered.\n\rThe mining suits should prevent the people inside from getting hurt.
The Black Hole has been activated. Now, hurry!
Not correcting the past is another mistake we cannot afford...
You're back! Thanks to your efforts, it seems many Maplers were able to gather the necessary Fossil Minerals to build their Time Machines. Whew!
Still, they will keep trying. Come back tomorrow to lend another hand.
We still have a chance to fix this! Return to the past and try again!
